value:
$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|$w0|Get yourselves together! We need
to get on the road immediately. A
Hero will soon appear at Vaskrheim.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|$w0|I wonder if it'll be someone we
already know...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|$w0|There's no telling.$k$pWhat we do know is this: this Hero
has manifested thanks to the
hopes of a great number of people...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|$w0|This Hero was summoned in
response to a rite held in a far-off
world...yet arrived here, not there.$k$pCome. Let us meet this Hero, one
who carries the wishes of so many...$k$p

$WmMPID_ワユ,ch09_09_Wayu_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Well, look who it is! Good thing I've
been training hard. Let's spar!$k$p$WmMPID_総選挙アイク,ch09_00_Ike_M_ELECTION01,Face|$w0|When the opponent is strong, it's
satisfying to test your skills against
them. Prepare yourselves!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|$w0|It's time to demonstrate our strength
to the Brave Heroes who guard this
temple!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_AMB_USERNAME,0|$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face|$w0|A fine demonstration of strength. And
now...$k$p$SspSE_SUMMON_STONE_FLASH|$Fo500,255,255,255,255|$Fi500|There it is! A sure sign of summoning.
The Hero should arrive any moment...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Ooh, I can barely stand it! Who do
you think it will be?$k$p$SspSE_SUMMON_STONE_FLASH|$Fo500,255,255,255,255|$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|$Fi500|$w0|The Hero that the people chose...is
now among us.$k$p$Sbs150|
